snippet: New York State should give sexual-abuse victims more time to file lawsuits against their attackers.
abstract: Editorial holds bill signed by New York Gov Andrew Cuomo adding compensated public school coaches to list of professionals required to report cases of child sex abuse is inadequate; asserts bill leaves many coaches uncovered and fails to address state's short statute of limitations, which allows many legitimate claims to go unaddressed.
lead_paragraph: New York State should give sexual-abuse victims more time to file lawsuits against their attackers.
